dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: People think a nationwide TV and radio blackout is some kind of emergency, but actually it's just routine maintenance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People think a nationwide T V and radio blackout is some kind of emergency, but actually it's just routine maintenance.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The service interruptions are part of routine efforts to ensure uninterrupted and high-quality broadcasting across the country, officials said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. This one's happening on April 30th, from 3 a.m. to 5 p.m. local time. That's a pretty long window.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. This one's happening on April thirtieth, from three a.m. to five p.m. local time. That's a pretty long window.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Television and radio channels across Kazakhstan will be temporarily suspended on April 30 due to scheduled maintenance work, according to the Ministry of Culture and Information. National operator Kazteleradio will carry out planned technical maintenance from 03:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and it's being done by the national operator, Kazteleradio. They're handling all the technical work on the networks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and it's being done by the national operator, Kazteleradio. They're handling all the technical work on the networks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: National operator Kazteleradio will carry out planned technical maintenance from 03:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It affects everything too—satellite, digital, even analog signals. So basically, if you're tuning in, you're probably out of luck during that time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It affects everything too-satellite, digital, even analog signals. So basically, if you're tuning in, you're probably out of luck during that time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The work will affect satellite, digital, and analog broadcasting networks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Ministry of Culture and Information is really emphasizing that this is just part of their regular efforts to keep the broadcast quality high.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Ministry of Culture and Information is really emphasizing that this is just part of their regular efforts to keep the broadcast quality high.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Television and radio channels across Kazakhstan will be temporarily suspended on April 30 due to scheduled maintenance work, according to the Ministry of Culture and Information. The service interruptions are part of routine efforts to ensure uninterrupted and high-quality broadcasting across the country, officials said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not even the first time this year—they did something similar back in March, remember?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not even the first time this year-they did something similar back in March, remember?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is not the first such disruption this year " a similar suspension was carried out in March as part of regular maintenance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, that's right. So it's definitely a planned, recurring thing, not some sudden technical meltdown.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, that's right. So it's definitely a planned, recurring thing, not some sudden technical meltdown.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Still, it's a bit of an inconvenience, especially for people who rely on those channels for news or entertainment during the day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, it's a bit of an inconvenience, especially for people who rely on those channels for news or entertainment during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. But I guess it's better than having constant signal issues or poor quality broadcasts down the line.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. But I guess it's better than having constant signal issues or poor quality broadcasts down the line.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True. And it's only for one day. Though fourteen hours is… quite a stretch.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True. And it's only for one day. Though fourteen hours is... quite a stretch.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: National operator Kazteleradio will carry out planned technical maintenance from 03:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time.

dialogue_turns.text: It is. But hey, maybe it'll give everyone a chance to, you know, go outside or read a book for a change.
